import React from'react';import{CurrentUserContext}from'../contexts/CurrentUserContext';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Card(_ref){var card=_ref.card,onCardClick=_ref.onCardClick,onCardLike=_ref.onCardLike,onCardDelete=_ref.onCardDelete;var currentUser=React.useContext(CurrentUserContext);// Определяем, являемся ли мы владельцем текущей карточки
